grouping: No aggregation; pass-through rows from neuract__TEMPERATURES
Natural row key is timestamp_utc; keep all source rows (no dedup)

semantics: This report is a direct time-series extract. Optional time filters from_ts/to_ts are inclusive and applied only when provided. No other parameters affect filtering. All tokens are row-level values; header uses row_column_12 as-is.
transformations: Direct select of timestamp_utc and specified PT100 PV columns from neuract__TEMPERATURES
Apply optional inclusive time window filters on timestamp_utc before ordering
No row-level computed columns; no totals math; maintain stable ORDER BY timestamp_utc ASC
